alert.note: Alert for Camden; Cumberland; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued November 12 at 3:07AM EST until November 14 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees are possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Salem, Gloucester, Camden, Northwestern Burlington and Cumberland. In Pennsylvania, Delaware, Philadelphia, Eastern Montgomery and Lower Bucks. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub-freezing temperatures are possible again Monday night through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Cumberland; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Salem
